website_summaries.verdict: This tin set is pretty, practical and comes with a carrying case so set pieces don't get lost.
pros: Teapot and cups can hold water
Case is a nice size to hold all of the pieces
A good size for little hands
No worries about chipping or breaking with this set
cons: The case is cardboard and not as durable as the set

customer_reviews.title: A very nice but small tea set.
customer_reviews.text: Big box, TINY tea set. My son loves it, but it's about the right size for a large doll, rather than for a toddler. However, excluding the size complaint, this was a cute set with a nice box. Update: A year later, my son still plays with this set way more than any of his other dishes!
customer_reviews.author: Carl L Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: Set was very cute. I knew not to expect much from the case, from reading reviews- seems silly to have such a cheap, cardboard case, but oh well, And, cups are very small. PROBLEM is- after 2 days, the tea pot is leaking where the spout comes together with the pot. Completely unacceptable and very disappointing to see my grand-daughter upset because she can't use it anymore.Of course all packaging etc. has been thrown away, so I feel returning is not an option. I guess she can still play with the other items, but I would recommend, if your child actually wants to use the tea pot with liquid, DON'T BUY THIS SET! :(
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Delaney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Tea Time!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her new Tin Tea Set from Alex. She has had many fun tea parties and drank lots of tea. This set caught her eye out of the many different sets we looked at.sShe really liked the colors and designs. I like that it came with a basket so she can keep everything stored safe inside. I washed it before she 1st used it and so far no rusting so I hope that stays true. The set is a little smaller than I expected but still great for my 4 yr old. Definitely recommend this and cheers to many fun tea parties ahead.
customer_reviews.author: A. Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Only one thing could be better
customer_reviews.text: We love this tea set. It is pretty, the perfect size for little hands, and is sturdier than porcelain. The box is very pretty also and keeps pieces up off the floor. The reason for only 4 stars is that the box has a flimsy piece of cardboard that holds the plates, cups, and teapot in place inside the suitcase. You could take it out, but everything will just clang around inside. We left it in, but from very little use, the slots for the plates are already torn. An insert of the quality of the outside of the suitcase would make this a solid 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: GypsyMama

customer_reviews.title: I really like this tea set
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tea set, it's sturdy and cute! My daughter loves putting water in the tea pot and pouring it out for each of her animals, and graham crackers on the plates. We got it when she was 2, now at 3 she is much more dexterous with it and makes less of a mess. But all the parts being made from metal really helps contain messes, and keep them from being smashed when stepped on, and even nice for use in the tub. The box or "picnic basket" is made of carboard though, and definitely does not hold up as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ciaran

customer_reviews.title: #grammawin
customer_reviews.text: Oh yes. Bought this for our 5 year old grandbabies for Christmas. It was a win, she started serving us tea upon opening. We bought the tin set because she has a large dog in her house which would likely eat anything else. I was a little disappointed the case wasn’t tin as well, but I guess in hindsight it doesn’t claim it is in the description. I love tea party dates with my gbaby. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Shelley H

customer_reviews.title: Tea pot is durable for liquid but the cups
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a metal tea set because the plastic one you can’t put water in it with out it dripping out. The tea pot is durable to put water in. If your kid is like my 4 year old, this is a plus The tray can hold the tea pot and like 2 cups with the plates. This is why I have it 4 stars. Cons: the one things I do not like is that while the tea put dose not leak the cups do leak.
customer_reviews.author: gloria

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter LOVES it.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this little Tea set. She had been playing with my daughter's 20 year old breakable set that was still here at my house and had broken several pieces. I was glad to find her a set that has the carry case and nonbreakable pieces. She Loves it! I was a little taken aback that the carry case isn't metal as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Jones

customer_reviews.title: Loved the product
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product, except for the case it was in? I would have paid more for a Tin carrying case. . The case is really flimsy, cardboard.... I bought this for my 4 year old grand daughter, the case will not survive a lot of use with a four year old. The Tea Set was durable and delightful
customer_reviews.author: Aileen

customer_reviews.title: The case is made of cardboard, the rest of the set is great.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this. For some reason I was expecting the case to be made of tin too. A bit disappointed. The cardboard case is not super strong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My two year old LOVES her tea cup set!
customer_reviews.text: My two year old daughter loves her tea cup set from ALEX TOYS! You get everything you see in the picture and it is a well made tin tea cup set. We've had it for over six months; use it regularly and it's still in excellent condition. No broken or dented pieces so far. I love that it comes with it's own case for storage and safe keeping. Surprisingly, my daughter hasn't gotten tired of it. She always wants to play "pretend" tea party with me and I love that! Well worth it and recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: So glad I purchased this for my Granddaughter !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Found this on Amazon to give our Granddaughter for Christmas. Price was phenomenal, and the quality is Great!!! Pieces are metal, very durable for a 4 year old. The pieces have no sharp edges to cut little hands or harm the furniture. Best of all, she loves it!!! It's her favorite toy to play with at Grandpa's. She uses it filled with tea(Kool-Aid), or empty. Either way, she adores it.
customer_reviews.author: BARRY HORTON

customer_reviews.title: Very good I'm happy
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my little girls Christmas and the box the tea pot and that is in was bigger than expected so I'm very happy about that I think she's going to love it and it is as shown in pictures xox
customer_reviews.author: Ainsley

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set. Metal cups
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set. Metal cups, tray, plates and saucers. The carry basket is heavy cardboard so I would not consider it for outdoor use as is advertised. Unfortunately the case may not last long as was opened yesterday and, as shown in photo, the seam looks like it may give out quickly.
customer_reviews.author: MBuzz

customer_reviews.title: Tin box makes organization easy
customer_reviews.text: This was a good deal. I think I got it as a lightning deal, and it was under $11. I like to stock up on toys to give to my nieces and nephews. It looks like a good set with lots of pieces, and it comes with a tin box to keep all the pieces organized. Though I don't encourage gender specific toys in general, I think it might be good for a toddler to play with.
customer_reviews.author: C. Luis

customer_reviews.title: I love that this tea set came in a little carrying ...
customer_reviews.text: I love that this tea set came in a little carrying case! My daughter loved that as well. The quality of this set is great and the colors are vibrant and fun. My only wish, is that it came with silverware that matched. If anyone would like to know, the tea pot does hold water as do all of the cups. Which makes a mess but brings many hours of fun that's for sure :) Very pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Really cute set
customer_reviews.text: The Alex Toys Tin Tea Set is adorable and very well made. The case is will not hold up very long because it is a thin cardboard. The set is a little smaller than I thought it would be. The colors are really vibrant and perfect for your little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger C.

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great set and hours of fun tea parties. Nice traveling case too! Saw some reviews say do not buy that it leaks water. It is not supposed to be used to hold real water - it is pretend!
customer_reviews.author: sandra zappa

customer_reviews.title: cute!
customer_reviews.text: my mom wanted to give my 4 year old a "tin tea set" and this was exactly what she was looking for! My 4 year old LOVED it! She plays with it all the time and I LOVE that it nicely goes back into the carrying case (and can get put away nicely when we are done playing with it). The colors and designs are super cute :-)
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Made a little girl very happy!
customer_reviews.text: My little niece was so excited with this set. She loved carrying it around to go places. The set is super cute and it looks durable and sturdy. We will see that with time.
customer_reviews.author: Balam

customer_reviews.title: Cups leak.
customer_reviews.text: Cute and colorful but the cups leak around the handles. Makes for a mess every time my granddaughter serves tea.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Cups leak
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but the cups leak where the handles attach. Same problem for the similar metal set kiddo received from her grandparents. Carry box is also cardboard, not metal, and already ripped
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed along with my granddaughter. All the tin cups leak where the handles are attached. There is a gap around each rivet. She was so disappointed that she could only pretend and not have a real tea party. The pieces are too small even for my 3 yr old granddaughter. Would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and durable
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. My daughter loves her new tea set. They are very small though but the quality is great and the carrier is nice for her to tote around the house. Perfect for her tiny hands but will have to upgrade to larger set once she grows out of her tiny 1 1/2 year old hands. Nice starter though!
customer_reviews.author: M. Elefante

customer_reviews.title: Darling tea set!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 5 year old great-niece that she opened at an early Christmas celebration this past weekend. I appreciated all of the reviews that indicated the pieces are quite small, so I was prepared for that and it didn't take away from how cute this set is. The quality seems good. I love the retro vibe of the pieces being metal; reminds me of my childhood. I think the little suitcase it comes in is darling too. My niece seemed to be thrilled with it!
customer_reviews.author: happy customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for little girls. It's just the right size so my dining room doesn't become too flooded, but bigger than the tiny dollar tree set. My girls always crack the plastic ones and glass is a huge problem, metal is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: bluepenguin

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: It leaks. My daughter and I have tons of tea parties with real tea and cookies so that's a bit of a problem. I didn't want to use a plastic set but it seems we may go that route after all.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great tea set. It's made very well and unlike other sets I've found it won't break! This was my daughter's favorite Christmas present this year. Very good choice for younger kids.
customer_reviews.author: DawnTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Set has vibrant color and is made well. The box will not make it very long, if that’s important to you, but it’s been played with a lot. No rough edges to worry about. Well made and popular. I would recommend it- bought it for granddaughters 3-5years old
customer_reviews.author: wendy b12

customer_reviews.title: Great tin set!
customer_reviews.text: The tin parts are great! But the box does NOT stay open. It always in flapping back shut right away. But the tea pot, cups, plates, and tray are all great and holding up well since Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Raven Ford-Moe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old daughter loves this tea set! She's had it for a month now and it still looks brand new. I love that it is tin and not porcelain or ceramic because she can drop these all day long and they won't break. The carrying case is nice to keep everything together and contained. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sunnie B.

customer_reviews.title: The lid of the teapot breaks ... we have tried two sets of this toy and it happened both times
customer_reviews.text: The lid of the teapot broke on the first teaser I bought for my daughter, so I called amazon and got a replacement set. After a month or so, the kid broke again... for the price and inconvenience, I should have purchased a tea set from pottery barn...
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommend! Super cute, very durable, and very reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my two little girls for Christmas and they absolutely love it. Little one has a bad habit of stepping on things instead of around them and has broken most of her old plastic tea set. This set holds up very well, not a single dent in anything!
customer_reviews.author: Kat Yoder

customer_reviews.title: Not as pretty as the pictures show it.
customer_reviews.text: The box is made out of paper and not tin. the set is cheaply made. I would not get this if I were you. look for another alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Imelda Pena

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nieces 2nd birthday party and she loves it. Shes been playing with it alot I bought s ol me felt food to go with it and it all goes in the carrying case it come with. It's small but just right for a toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4 year old approved
customer_reviews.text: The set is absolutely adorable! My 4 year old loves it. I was a little shocked at how small it was but the kids don’t mind one bit. Love that it’s metal and easy to wipe down. The case is a wonderful part of the package
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Light case, nice colors, great material. Perfect gift for toddlers.
customer_reviews.text: My 3-year-old absolutely LOVED her new tea set. Perfect in size, even to carry around, as the little case is fairly light. Colors are really nice and vibrant. Wish it had at least a couple of matching tea spoons, though.
customer_reviews.author: Anaina Rivero

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! My kids play with them daily! My only disappointment was that the case is cardboard. This was my error but I thought it was stainless steal as well. Be careful not to put any wet tea cups back of it gets soggy and will rip. Great buy and would do it again!
customer_reviews.author: Kasondra Ham

customer_reviews.title: The great thing about this set is it is very well ...
customer_reviews.text: The great thing about this set is it is very well made. The suitcase works perfect to store the set in when not out for the TeaParty. Perfect also in that because the tea set is metal no matter ne has to worry about it breaking. Great purchase for a rainy day,grandma day or just plain ole day TeaParty.
customer_reviews.author: sharp

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. Does have some small parts (like top of the tea kettle) so be careful around young children. I like the storage box feature, but my toddler stepped on the box and it broke. Box isn't made of anything strong- just a tough cardboard.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: Lovely little tea set
customer_reviews.text: Like others have said, the set is small. However, it is meant for a small child and therefore it is perfect. Everything fits back into the case and is stored away in its place. We love it. It’s durable and cute.
customer_reviews.author: Charleigh Rose

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful tea set
customer_reviews.text: I love this tea set. Comes in a great little carrying case. I love that it's made of metal instead of plastic. And while I do love porcelain tea sets, they can easily break. My 3 year old absolutely loves it as well! She likes to put water inside and actually pour and sip... the only complaint is that our tin teapot leaks ever so slightly.
customer_reviews.author: Kimchee

customer_reviews.title: A leaking tea cup is worthless!
customer_reviews.text: Sorry, but this tea set gets a big fat zero from me. First time use was a bust : two of the four cups leaked like a sieve. Wondering how I can get a refund if the original packaging was discarded?
customer_reviews.author: dabney

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy box.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this by accident and wound up giving it to my 6 year old daughter for Christmas. For an accident, it sure gets played ALOT! The set is a thin metal and the box has straps inside to put the stuff away and store. Sturdy box.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Zulkoski

customer_reviews.title: All cups leak
customer_reviews.text: Every single tea cup leaked. The tin seemed like a happy medium between breakable glass or cheesy plastic, but where the handles are attached isn’t seemed well. Any time my daughter tries to play tea party with water they all drop a ton. Trying to return item now, but doesn’t make her any less upset that the present she waited so long for had to be returned and now she has to wait longer for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything is so teeny tiny that it’s only good for the dolls to have a
customer_reviews.text: Bought this tea set for my 3 year to have tea parties with us. Everything is so teeny tiny that it’s only good for the dolls to have a party
customer_reviews.author: MSchrader

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set, looks perfect upon opening. Unfortunately, the teapot and one cup leaked through the attached rivets. Sending it back and getting a replacement. Fingers crossed it doesn’t leak!
customer_reviews.author: Searchlight

customer_reviews.title: This was the perfect tea set for my three year old
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect tea set for my three year old. The tin is durable, and without holes like many of the plastic sets. She likes to put water in the set to have "tea" and this has been great. I would definitely reccomend this set for toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: JBCB

customer_reviews.title: Good set, needs a better case
customer_reviews.text: The tea set itself is cute and I like that it is made from tin because it’s practically indestructible to my 4 year old however the case was a bit of a disappointment when we found out it was made of cardboard so In under a weeks time it was destroyed and Thrown away. Other then that the set it great.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer RA

customer_reviews.title: Tea cups not made for liquid
customer_reviews.text: I thought buying non plastic would make this a keeper. Unfortunately the cups just produced rust and leaked.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Hill

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest, most feminine tea set. I love everything about it. The case is so cute, the dishes are all made tin and so it will be durable. My daughter is loving having tea parties with her brother who thinks it's pretty fun to pour the water. No complaints adorable set.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda RasmusonTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: Great for a Toddler!
customer_reviews.text: This little tea set is perfect for a toddler. There is one small piece - the lid for the teapot - which we removed from the set before giving it to our 2-year old. The little suitcase that it comes in is only made of cardboard but fits all of the items great with room for tea set related things as well (plastic food and such). So many sets are breakable but this one is very cute yet withstands the roughness of a younger child. My daughter loves bringing tea to my husband and I and seems to keep her occupied for quite some time.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: They leak. Don’t buy unless for decoration
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter to have tea parties. They are cute and look well made but they all leak. Don’t spend the money unless you just want them for decoration. Complete mess
customer_reviews.author: Missclassy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap garbage
customer_reviews.text: This tea set is terrible. First, the box is cardboard and likely to be smashed within a few days of play. Second, all of the cups leak. Looks like where the handle is attached was poorly put together and water drips out. Lastly, these are way smaller than described. They look like they are more fit for dolls than kids. I have no idea how these have such good reviews other than they must be fake.
customer_reviews.author: rocketracer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a great gift for my three year old’s birthday. The set is adorable, and the box the set comes in is durable and large enough that my daughter can carry the tea set and other things in it. I like that the set looks like porcelain, but it made of metal so it cannot be broken, no matter how many times she drops them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for 2 to 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: Change my rating. Granddaughter loves it. At first I thought it wouldn't be anything she would like but she loves it.we play Tea party every time she comes over which is 5 days s week. She is 2 1/2
customer_reviews.author: papa

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: So cute. Daughter loves. Would lOve if the container it came in might be plastic rather than a cardboard design. Otherwise the perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Ann M.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but leaks
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it for her birthday but literally used them 1 time and it perfect, then used it a 2nd time and everything leaks water everywhere and not just a little either. It really sucks cause she had been wanting this so long. Oh well 🤷🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Most importantly... magnetic!
customer_reviews.text: Fun trick: Place a couple magnets on the underside of the serving tray. The plates and cups will now snap and stick into place! Can also be stored on any cieling or wall using said magnets, so you can serve tea Mad Hatter style!
customer_reviews.author: Customer #55743928543

customer_reviews.title: Durable and adorable
customer_reviews.text: It’s called a “pretend” tea set but I’ve had to drink more tepid water out of this set than I’d like to admit. My daughter absolutely loves it and it’s more durable than the plastic ones she’s gotten in the past. We have big plans for a picnic afternoon tea when spring comes.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Garrett

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy but some of them leak but for a toy for little girls it is great
customer_reviews.author: Wade

customer_reviews.title: Tea set
customer_reviews.text: Tea set was smaller than I thought it would be, however, my niece loved it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Burgett

customer_reviews.title: cute product with some issues
customer_reviews.text: This tea set is very cute and my 3-year old daughter loves to play with it (5 stars). However, I have to deduct 2 stars for the quality of the case (which is made of paper/cardboard) and the quality of the tea pot (which arrived with a small dent). I recommend buying this on a sale.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Lee

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter absolutely loves this. We got it for her for her 2nd birthday and she plays with it regularly. It even withstood her standing on the cups and dipping them in the dog bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona

customer_reviews.title: Didn't realize you couldn't put liquid in it. It ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize you couldn't put liquid in it. It leaks out at the handle. But very cute. My kids use it for pretend play.
customer_reviews.author: Kara B

customer_reviews.title: My daughter love this, hasn't shown an rust signs yet when ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter love this, hasn't shown an rust signs yet when she puts water in it to use as "tea" but I will update that if it does.
customer_reviews.author: everydaynormalgirl

customer_reviews.title: It is cute and looks just like the photos
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this set for my 3yo daughter as a Christmas gift. It is cute and looks just like the photos, and the carrying case is surprisingly sturdy. However, we were hoping for a tea set that would be functional for tiny tea parties with water or cool tea, and the teapot leaks at the metal seam between pot and spout. The knob on the lid of the teapot also broke off within three days of play. Still searching for the perfect tea set!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my daughters birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: PROS * brightly colored * nice storage case CONS *a little to small for my 6 yr olds hands, more suitable for dolls *since the set is made of tin, the teacups tend to slide of the tea saucers OFTEN which frustrates my little one
customer_reviews.author: EishaHooks

customer_reviews.title: This set is adorable. I bought one for home and one for ...
customer_reviews.text: This set is adorable. I bought one for home and one for daycare. They are both used daily. The one at daycare is taking heavy play from a group of five 1-3 year olds and it still looks like it did when it was opened. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Vamazonreview

customer_reviews.title: Damaged box
customer_reviews.text: I mainly decided on this tea set for the suitcase box as my daughter got one for her 1st birthday years ago and loved carrying the case around with her. I purchased this for a gift for a friend, just received it and the box is damaged. The corner is pushed in :( really disappointed. The birthday party is this weekend so no time to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Tea pot leaks at bottom
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas. So it's taken me some to review. My daughter lives this tea set and has tea parties all the time. But the tea pot leaks around the bottom. It makes a huge mess. Maybe the manufacturer will give me the option to get another one?!
customer_reviews.author: kcepp

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this tea set! It was exactly as described and good value.
customer_reviews.author: Zack

customer_reviews.title: Good set for four
customer_reviews.text: I love the tin and the pattern and the pretty box - not sure how the box will hold up. I was replacing an old set of Madeline ones that was so similar only the Madeline one had little napkins and table cloth. I wish this had that too.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: This set is so cute. It's metal and reminds me of toys when I was little. My daughters love it! (set doesn't come with tiny picnic blanket in my photo)
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: 3 Year old Granddaughter liked it.
customer_reviews.text: Thsi was a hit at Christmas for the 3 year old granddaughter. We had make believe tea and cookies all afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughters LOVE this set!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tea set. Both my 18 month-old and 4 1/2 year-old granddaughters enjoy playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Cheery

customer_reviews.title: Great for all!
customer_reviews.text: My 1.5 year old loves this! Her mimi also has it at her house and it has stood the test of time! Kids 1-10 year old play tea party with it!
customer_reviews.author: Kwats

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: So cute I like the casw to store the plates and cups Nice quality
customer_reviews.author: AshleyMarie

customer_reviews.title: Play Tea set
customer_reviews.text: Tea set is great for my 3 year old granddaughter that’s always wants to pretend play
customer_reviews.author: jerry alexander

customer_reviews.title: Please send me the print out receipt for for the last orders  of September. Thank you.
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty as a gift, my girl will have a great Birthday surprise. But I really need the receipt for every items I just ordered this week. For the headphones, Tea sets and scrunch is. Please.?
customer_reviews.author: Maritza

customer_reviews.title: Cute but small
customer_reviews.text: I love this set but I wasnt expecting them to be so small that was kinda disappointing ... I would definitely say 3 and younger
customer_reviews.author: TEARZA

customer_reviews.title: so-so not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Ok but don’t expect it to stand up very long. Pretty flimsy, not like the old stuff. Case is really cheaply built.
customer_reviews.author: nubyar

customer_reviews.title: Super cute tea set
customer_reviews.text: Very cute little tea set, I got it for my granddaughter for her 3rd birthday and she loved it. Very nice for the price. It was small like the other reviews said but she's little and we don't really plan on actually 'using' it, only for pretend. So it's perfect. The carry case is an addend bonus to keep all the pieces together
customer_reviews.author: Kmzilla

customer_reviews.title: Cute for a 3 yr old.
customer_reviews.text: It was cute and my granddaughter plays with it still.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Talbot

customer_reviews.title: Cute set but carrying case damaged
customer_reviews.text: The actual tea set is well made and durable. My 3 year old daughter loves it. The serving tray with it is adorable! The reason for the 3 stars is that the adorable carrying case it comes with isn’t very sturdy and mine came damaged. Can’t return it either bc I let my daughter open and play with it already. Wish the carrying case was more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Sukhjit Kaur

customer_reviews.title: The kit is worth it. You may have to grab a cheap bin to keep it in because the case breaks easily.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute set with Metal pieces that are painted. Only down side is the carrying case was made on the cheaper side.
customer_reviews.author: Lacie E

customer_reviews.title: I bought this tea set and we love it. The colors are nice and bright and ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tea set and we love it. The colors are nice and bright and match a little table and chair set we have. Many happy hours spent using this set.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Winnie

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great toy! Playing over a year! Still in great shape
customer_reviews.author: Farshad Harandi

customer_reviews.title: Much nicer than I thought they'd be. And really ...
customer_reviews.text: Much nicer than I thought they'd be. And really cute bright colors. I would definitely order them again if I needed a quick gift.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: LEAKS!
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute and dainty, but everything LEAKS! When we tried to use real tea in it the cups and pot leak badly through all the seams. What a disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: cailin

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this tea set
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this tea set! My daughter, who is 3, plays with it often- The best part is that everything fits neatly back into the box for her to tote around. She loves it, she calls it her picnic basket and it is large enough for her to fit some pretend food into along with the tea set. So far has been very durable, we have only had it a couple months, but it is played with often and they can be pretty rough with it at times. I am going to be getting one for my niece, who is 4, for her birthday because she loved it so much too!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: cute but not practical
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece for her birthday and she loved it! It's super cute and has really convenient carrying case. The only downside is that the little cups leak when you put liquid in them. I know it's a pretend tea set but she really loves to play tea party with water and snacks.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Such a cute set and high quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Such a cute set and high quality. Box doesn't do well with water so if a little One is using it you can't sore the dishes in the carry box for long because it is card board. But the dishes are adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Sealander

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: The tea set is cute but I got it because it's metal and my girls could actually use and and not break it. The problem is, they cant use it bc it leaks. Christmas morning, my 4 year old was so excited and poured in some water and the cups all leak. So she can't actually have a tea party at all.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Powell

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made! The box is so cute that it comes in. My two year old loves playing with this tea set
customer_reviews.author: Johnna Warden

customer_reviews.title: What a delight!
customer_reviews.text: Got this set for my granddaughter & we often enjoy it together!!
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Best Tea Set For Kids!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my kids and they loved it so much that I bought it for my niece as well. They have had it for a few years now and STILL use it!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: CUPS LEAK
customer_reviews.text: I didn't care that the package was cheap or the tea set is tiny, but the cups DON'T HOLD WATER. What is the point???
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: couldn’t have chosen any better. Great quality
customer_reviews.text: So my husband has 11 nieces and nephews. I bought this for all 3 of the girls because they reminded me of the ones I had when I was a little girl. I rock...couldn’t have chosen any better. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Robin C Rush

customer_reviews.title: Very cute set. Seems plenty durable enough to last ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute set. Seems plenty durable enough to last my toddler awhile. She loves the little traveling case it comes with!
customer_reviews.author: American Daughter

product_meta.title: Alex Pretend Tea Time Kids Tea Set, 16 Piece
product_meta.description: Style:StandardALEX Pretend Tin Tea Set is a 16 piece floral themed tin tea set that comes packed in a bright and beautifully printed case. Anytime is the perfect time for a tea party with this adorable set. Have all your friends and maybe even a family member over for a spot of tea. This tin tea set is both adorable and durable, so it's perfect for young children. Little ones can even put together a precious party with real treats. The floral printed dishes in this set are washable for an easy clean up. All pieces are safe, clean and perfect for indoor or outdoor play. Includes a floral theme pattern tin teapot with lid, 4 tin cups, 4 tin saucers, 4 tin plates, tin serving tray and carrying case. Recommended for children 3 years of age and older.
feature_bullets: Great for indoor and outdoor tea parties
Floral theme pattern matches the case
Dr Toy's best classic toys and oppenheim toy portfolio gold seal award winner
Includes a teapot with lid, 4 cups, 4 saucers, 4 plates, serving tray and carrying case
Recommended for children 3 years of age and older
